description: Agile is today's buzz word in Project Management. Agile typically refers to leaner processes, faster development and quicker deployment. While Agile as a concept has been in practise since time immemorial, it gained importance only in recent decades. At this backdrop came the Agile Certified Practitioner, a Globally Recognized Certification provided by the PMI Institute for asserting competencies in Agile Methodologies. The ACP has and continues to grow in number of participants taking the exam year on year. This Course by ApnaCourse.com is an overview course on Agile, why Agile, Agile Methodologies, Agile Principles, Agile vs Scrum, DSDM, Agile Manifesto, eXtreme Programming, Lean Alignment and more. The aim of this course is to help you understand the basics of Agile and its usage in day-to-day project management activities
title: Agile Certified Practitioner (ACP) - Agile Methodologies
